txt.en: Bring the feathers to Sergeant Tidlac
Sergeant Tidlac is keeping watch on the road from the fort of Twickenburg, between Harwick and Floodwend.\n\nYou should bring the feathers to Sergeant Tidlac.
The hill of Cracabor is covered in spying crebain that intimidate the surrounding lands with their sinister gazes.
'The feathers you collected from the crebain will be very useful, [placeholder]. We use them for arrows, bedding, and all sorts of things. Better for us to have them than those evil birds.'
The hill of Cracabor is covered in spying crebain that intimidate the surrounding lands with their sinister gazes.
The hill of Cracabor is the highest point in the Wold, and is located just north of the Twickenburg.\n\nYou should climb Cracabor and collect feathers from the evil flock that has landed there.
The hill of Cracabor is the highest point in the Wold, and is located just north of the Twickenburg.\n\nYou should climb Cracabor and collect feathers from the evil flock that has landed there.
